idea:
We build sustainable, reputable brands using integrated marketing communication solutions.

Brand House Network uses marketing communications to create an identity for products and services that have meaning to customers. This includes (not restricted to) elements such as visual symbols, values, reputation, customer experience, recognition and awareness in the market.

The strategy is to use a plan to deliver result oriented marketing communication programs and reputation management campaigns that enhance our clients’ awareness, improve their sales and foster their growth.

BHN believes in brand values as a statement about the character, ethics and integrity of a brand.

Objectives include both end-goals such as revenue and steps towards aforementioned end-goals such as the image of a brand in the market.

The following are common brand objectives:

• We create and nurture identity & image.

Establishing an identity for a brand in the market is a key goal. This, measured with surveys that discover how a brand is viewed by the target market is the yardstick we work with.

• We create and nurture brand awareness and recall.

Ensure the elements created for the brand impact the percentage of customers who recognize the brand name and visual symbols such as logo, packaging, brand colours and products.

• We create engagement and impact brand loyalty.

Increased positive engagement is a solid measure of how often customers interact with the brand, preferably repeatedly. Said interactions are defined and can include things like visiting a website, visiting a location, making an order and reviewing a product.

• We help enhance advocacy to build brand equity. We also help enhance market share and create a solid share of voice in the industry for the brand.

The true test of a brand’s acceptance comes from the number of users and repeat customers recommending the same to their peer group. This definitely enhances the estimated value of the brand.

• We believe in enhancing and sustaining margins.

Consistently improve revenue margins of a brand driven by factors such as brand identity, brand awareness, brand legacy and premium products.

• We get to know your business.

We keep abreast of what’s going on in your business and ours — so we can deliver the best solutions possible.

• We’re great to work with.

We like to have fun, but we’re serious about results. We have strong opinions, are passionate about our work - have no attitude. We know our craft, but are open minded and all ideas are welcome.

• We do the right thing.

We recommend tactics that make sense, even if it means less money in our pocket. We find the most cost-effective means to achieve your goals. We strongly believe in, and promote ethical practises only.
name: Brand House Network (BH Network Pvt. Ltd)

idea:
Esperer BioResearch Pvt Ltd



Esperer Bioresearch Pvt Ltd. having its corporate office in Mumbai, India, was established on August 16th   2018. Esperer Bioresearch currently operates in therapeutic areas in human health, mainly Oncology, & Onco supportive care segment and offers a strong and diversified product portfolio. Esperer is holding manufacturing loan licences for 73 products in anticancer range, from WHO-GMP certified plant with the presence of 26 SKUs in India. Esperer Bioresearch’s global aspiration has been initiated, with the registrations of anti-cancer medicines.

Esperer follows a comprehensive multi-stakeholder approach in all therapeutic areas relevant to product port-folio. Company  works with partners from the government, non-government and private sectors with own sales-marketing team in pan India level and also with strong back up team of supply chain and finance to overcome barriers to healthcare in India.
